department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Royal Military College of Canada has a requirement for the purchase of services of a firm to act on their behalf for the acquisition of subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media.
description: The contract is for the purchase of the services of a firm to act on behalf of the Royal Military College of Canada for the acquisition of subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media, including but not limited to traditional print material that may be added to the physical holdings of a library, as well as electronic content hosted remotely by a publisher.
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Tender Overview**
-----------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-food (AAFC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Subscription Agent Services.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   Tender Number: WS4413611224
*   Solicitation Number: WS4413611224
*   Publication Date: February 7, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date and Time: February 20, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EST
*   Anticipated Contract Start Date: February 16, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: February 15, 2025 (with options to renew for two additional one-year periods)

**Supply Arrangement**
--------------------

This RFP is related to Supply Arrangement E60PI-23AGNT-B, which is incorporated by reference. 

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The successful bidder will be required to provide Subscription Agent Services for the Royal Military College of Canada, including:

*   Acquiring subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media
*   Delivering, managing, and supporting said subscriptions
*   Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform

**Invitations to Tender**
-------------------------

The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal: 

*   EBSCO Canada LTD

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

This tender is being conducted using the competitive and selective tendering method.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Matthew Curran  
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
Email: [matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**
--------------

The complete tender notice can be accessed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18738271?extsite=MTg3MzgyNzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that the contractor changed the closing date from February 7 to 20.
